question: In what year was Matera designated as the European Capital of Culture for 2019 along with Plovdiv?
asked_question_translated: V katerem letu je bila Matera skupaj s Plovdivom imenovana za evropsko prestolnico kulture za leto 2019?
answer: Matera je bila skupaj s Plovdivom imenovana za evropsko prestolnico kulture za leto 2019 v letu 2014.
answer_translated_eng: Matera was named European Capital of Culture for 2019 in 2014, together with Plovdiv.
